metadata.name: Merge Day Solarpunk Daydream #00
metadata.description:
Daydream #00: ReGenesis Rainbow Ethereum Logo  
This token represents celebrating a new era for Ethereum that includes all people on Earth. Crypto must embrace all of humanity to truly thrive. LGBTQIA+ lives matter!  Black lives matter! Trans lives matter! Indigenous lives matter! To ensure that we survive and thrive as one humanity we must dismantle the existing inequality and discrimination that holds us back.  
These AI images were curated to represent an optimistic future, one where humanity overcomes the obstacles driving us apart and works together collaboratively to solve our problems. The collection was created on Merge Day, September 15, 2022 to celebrate the enormous W. Ethereum execution and consensus layers have merged making Ethereum a Proof of Stake blockchain, drastically reducing the greenhouse gas emissions of humanity.
